item.title: Why you can’t make money in consumer applications?
item.description: The article is written based on intuitions and not data driven. It is based on the heuristics and biases at that time and hence It could be wrong. I would love to learn if there are any pitfalls in this article or any variables that I haven’t considered from you people in the comments
